document_data.name: Souleman's Sublime
document_data.mainbody: '''Souleman's Sublime''' was a type of [[wine]], local to the city of [[Westgate]] on the [[Dragon Coast]].
document_data.Description: Souleman's Sublime was a thick and pungent wine, a specialty of a well-respected brewery in Westgate. Despite its taste and texture, the concoction went down smoothly, making the drinker feel a sensation of flight.
document_data.History: By the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], this popular wine could be purchased in many of Westgate's inns and drinking establishments, including [[The Track]], an underground racing ring and gambling establishment on the [[Market Triangle]].
